verses.name: Jeremiah 31:23
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord of hosts, the God of Israel; As yet they shall use this speech in the land of Judah and in the cities thereof, when I shall bring again their captivity; The Lord bless thee, O habitation of justice, and mountain of holiness.

verses.name: Jeremiah 31:24
verses.text: And there shall dwell in Judah itself, and in all the cities thereof together, husbandmen, and they that go forth with flocks.

verses.name: Jeremiah 31:25
verses.text: For I have satiated the weary soul, and I have replenished every sorrowful soul.

verses.name: Jeremiah 31:26
verses.text: Upon this I awaked, and beheld; and my sleep was sweet unto me.
